EXPERIENCES.title: Sr. Web Development Engineer
EXPERIENCES.information: Made the integration of Urbanizo's maps technology into Imovelweb's website, connecting the nonREL app with their existing relational structure. Placed millions of their real estate listing into GEO Polygons maps navigation.

EXPERIENCES.title: Sr. Web Development Engineer
EXPERIENCES.location: Scalable Path – San Francisco, CA, USA
EXPERIENCES.information: Had my first Laravel experience on a remote team. Contributed with the development of the OSS payments library chosen by the team (Payum), adding a Paypal refund processor to it.

EXPERIENCES.title: Co-Founder & Web Development Engineer
EXPERIENCES.information: In charge of product development, modeled and coded the solution from idea to execution. Scraped hundreds of millions real estate ads from Brazilian websites, set up an automated enviroment to run multiple crawlers. Changed the model to a nonREL hierarchical tree and increased performance in more than 200%. Failed to apply the technology at first, buit resilience, delivered the product and successfully sold the company to an international group few years later.

EXPERIENCES.title: Sr. Web Middleware Engineer
EXPERIENCES.information: Deployed to and kept more than 80 OC4J production instances online, backed up, lod rotated, load balanced, available and cached. Took on my resposibility, after a coleague left the company, 60 JBoss production instances.

EXPERIENCES.title: Pre-Sales consultant - Solutions Specialist
EXPERIENCES.information: Developed a new product website. Implemented an automated report system, that was sold as a service as part of Quest Software Spotlight post sales process.

EXPERIENCES.title: Pre-Sales consultant - Solutions Specialist
EXPERIENCES.information: Have been the Solution Specialist on dozens of huge deals. Took a deep dive on UNIX systems. On the second yearwas selected to be part of Oracle Center of Excelence, as security options, Identity Management and High Availability specialist.
